Title: Relates to powers of the public employment relations board to assess damages
Summary: Relates to powers of the public employment relations board to assess damages; authorizes the board to assess exemplary damages upon a finding that an offending party has committed repeated improper practices or an egregious practice.
LawCode: Amd ยง205, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to powers of the public employment relations board to assess damages
